thread.title: Ahly Crowned Super Champions after Win over Modern Future FC-SIS
thread.title_full: Ahly Crowned Super Champions after Win over Modern Future FC-SIS

title: Ahly Crowned Super Champions after Win over Modern Future FC-SIS
text: Media Center Ahly Crowned Super Champions after Win over Modern Future FC Friday، 29 December 2023 - 09:54 AM Ahly overcame a spirited Modern Future FC to lift the Egyptian Super Cup for the 14th time on Thursday 28/12/2023, prevailing 4-2 in a thrilling extra-time encounter in Abu Dhabi. Mahmoud "Kahraba" Abdel-Moneim headed the opener after 13 minutes and Hussein El Shahat's strike in the 34th doubled the seal in what it seemed an easy affair for the Cairo giants, but second-half substitutes Omar El-Said and Mohamed Mahmoud pulled Modern Future level late in the second half.
